field.label: Default Value
field.comment: When sending a campaign that uses template personalisation, a default value ensures that a value is always displayed even if a data field is blank.

field.label: Visibility
field.comment: Make the field public if you want to allow your contacts to view and amend the data you hold on them in this field.

field.label: Allow non-subscribed contacts to be imported
Allow review reminder for non-subscribed contacts
field.comment: Enable this if you want to allow review reminder email to be sent also to contacts who haven't opted in (This will always exclude unsubscribed contacts).

field.label: Delay Period (Days)
field.comment: The system will send the reminder the selected number of days after order creation, if the order status matches.

field.label: Reviews Anchor
field.comment: Please provide the anchor used on product pages for reviews e.g. #reviews

field.label: Feefo Logon
field.comment: This is what you provided Feefo during account setup and is usually your website domain name.

field.label: Reviews Per Product
field.comment: Number of reviews to display per product.

field.label: Logo Template (Optional)
field.comment: Enter name of logo template.

field.label: Service Score URL
field.comment: Enter Feefo logon above before using this URL.

field.label: Product Reviews URL
field.comment: Enter Feefo logon above before using this URL.

field.label: Passcode
field.comment: Recommended: Set a passcode so that basket contents and coupon codes can only be viewed if the following passcode is sent with the request.

field.label: Abandoned Carts (Deprecated)
field.comment: Use the abandoned cart block functionality from EasyEditor.

field.label: Coupon Codes (Deprecated)
field.comment: We recommend using the 'dotdigital Coupon URL Builder' in Marketing > Promotions > Cart Price Rules.

field.label: Order Recommendation (Deprecated)
field.comment: Use dotdigital Engagement Cloud's built-in product recommendation functionality. Learn more

field.comment: Use dotdigital Engagement Cloud's built-in product recommendation functionality. Learn more

field.comment: Use dotdigital Engagement Cloud's built-in product recommendation functionality. Learn more

field.label: Most Viewed URL
field.comment: Add category_id/@CATEGORY_ID@ at the end of url to filter most viewed by category

field.comment: Comma Separated Product Id's

field.label: Sync additional campaigns as templates
field.comment: Mapped templates will be available to select under any Magento template dropdown.

field.label: Data fields calculation with status
field.comment: Select multiple statuses by pressing Ctrl button while selecting

field.label: Brand Attribute
field.comment: Select your brand attribute. By default, the 'Manufacturer' attribute will be used.

field.label: Web Behavior Tracking Profile Id
field.comment: Web Behavior Tracking enables you to have greater insight into how customers and visitors interact with your website. Check out how to set up your unique tracking profile.

field.label: Import subscribers with their consent information
field.comment: Enable this is you want to import consent insight data when customers subscribe via the newsletter signup form, registration form or during checkout.

field.label: Consent text provided to your subscribers above the newsletter signup form
field.comment: Please provide the consent text that is currently displayed to your customers when they subscribe to your newsletter (i.e. via the newsletter signup form)

field.label: Consent text provided on registration, account dashboard and checkout
field.comment: If different from above, provide the text that is displayed on your registration and checkout form to get consent from your customers and guests. If provided, this text will also be displayed in the customer's newsletter subscription page.

field.label: Import Order With Status
field.comment: Select multiple statuses by pressing Ctrl button while selecting

field.label: Order Custom Attributes
field.comment: Select custom order attributes that you want to import with your order data. Select multiple by pressing Ctrl button while selecting.

field.label: Product Attributes
field.comment: Selected product attribute(s) will be imported in order and catalog syncs.

field.label: Include Product Custom Options In Order Sync
Easy Email Capture (Checkout)
field.comment: Enable this if you have a checkout process that allows the visitor to enter their email address during the checkout, but it does not update quote table instantly.

field.label: Easy Email Capture (Newsletter)
field.comment: Enable this if you would like to update quote table with email entered in Newsletter Email Field.

field.label: Allow abandoned cart for non-subscribed contacts
field.comment: Enable this if you want to allow abandoned cart emails to be sent also to contacts who haven't opted in (This will always exclude unsubscribed contacts)

field.label: Abandoned Cart Limit
field.comment: Do not send an abandoned cart email to a contact if they have received a previous abandoned cart email in previous x hours.

field.label: Link Text
field.comment: Please provide the link text. If no text provided then default text "Take Me To My Basket" will be used.

field.label: Cart URL
field.comment: Please provide the cart url. If no url provided then default cart url checkout/cart will be used. Only enter the url after base url. For example for http://www.localhost.com/checkout/cart only enter checkout/cart

field.label: Customer Login URL
field.comment: Please provide the customer login url. If no url provided then default login url customer/account/login will be used. Only enter the url after base url. For example for http://www.localhost.com/customer/account/login only enter customer/account/login

field.label: Expire Time
field.comment: The number of hours to wait before expiring an abandoned cart when a contact is pending opt in

field.label: Dynamic Styling
field.comment: Styling entered here will apply to all dynamic content areas pulled from Magento. Classes References Used : 'product-table', 'product-name', 'product-price', 'product-url', 'other-text'

field.label: Other Text (Will Apply To Other Remaining Text)
Product Link Text
field.comment: Please provide the link text. If no text provided then default text will be used.

field.label: Catalog Visibility
field.comment: Selected visibility type products will be exported.

field.label: Catalog Type
field.comment: Selected product type(s) will be exported.

field.label: Addressbooks to Show
field.comment: Choose additional address books to show in addition to the Magento General Subscription list.

field.label: Data Fields To Show
field.comment: Only data fields with visibility public can be shown to customers. You can create more data fields within the Data Mapping section.

field.label: Enable Subscribers Sales Data Sync
field.comment: Enabling ability to sync subscribers sales data increases server load and overall sync times.

field.label: Remove /pub directory from URLs
field.comment: Enable this to remove the /pub directory from image URLs in catalog sync and insight data.

field.label: Automap Data Fields
field.comment: Map Magento data to Engagement Cloud data fields, including customer, address and sales information.

field.label: Date Range
field.comment: If any of the data range is not selected then full data refresh will be done. This Date Range does not apply on Customer and Subscribers refresh.

field.label: Debug Api Calls Time
field.comment: Set the number in seconds that api calls greater will be logged.

field.label: Custom OAUTH Domain
field.comment: Enter the custom domain for authorization. Make sure that base URL ends with '/' (slash), e.g. http://yourdomain/magento/

field.label: Custom Authorization URI
field.comment: Enter the custom authorization url. Make sure that base URL ends with '/' (slash), e.g. http://yourdomain/magento/

field.label: Dynamic Pages IP Restriction
field.comment: Enter IP addresses separated by comma (,). An empty list will ignore any security check. Please ensure you keep the latest dotdigital IP ranges included here.
